description.p: Serial Studio lets you visualize real-time data from microcontrollers and connected devices. It's ideal for monitoring sensor output, debugging hardware, and analyzing telemetry from sources like serial ports, Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), and TCP/UDP.
Whether you're a student, hobbyist, or engineer, Serial Studio gives you insight into what your hardware is doing, live.

ul.li: Cross-platform: Native support for Windows, macOS, and Linux
CSV export: Save incoming data for offline analysis
Multiple inputs: Serial, BLE, TCP/UDP (MQTT available in Pro version)
Custom dashboards: Design interfaces with visual widgets using the Project Editor
Advanced decoding: Use JavaScript to parse structured or binary data streams

description.p: Note: This Flatpak package includes the open-source GPLv3 version of Serial Studio only. Commercial features such as MQTT integration, 3D plotting, CANBus/Modbus and XY plots are not included.

description.p: Serial Studio is a multi-platform data visualization tool for embedded systems and IoT projects. Connect to your hardware via serial ports, Bluetooth LE, or network protocols to monitor sensor data, debug firmware, and analyze telemetry in real-time.
Features include customizable dashboards, CSV export, JavaScript-based data parsing, and support for multiple data sources.
